XXadbhutdu:1_0: [0] evaṃ mayā śrutam ekasmin samaye bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati sma veṇuvane kalandakanivāse.
XXadbhutdu:2_0: [1] athāyuṣmān ānandaḥ pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣat.
XXadbhutdu:2_1: adrākṣīd āyuṣmān ānando rājagṛhe nagare sāvadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāṇo 'nyatamasmin pradeśe kūṭāgāram aśītidvāram ulliptāvaliptam ucchṛtadhvajapatākam āmuktapaṭṭadāmakalāpam.
XXadbhutdu:2_3_0: yaḥ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā īdṛśaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ kārayitvā caturdiśe
XXadbhutdu:2_3_1: bhikṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhatḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasyāmalakapramāṇaṃ
XXadbhutdu:2_3_2: stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ cchatraṃ yavaphalapramāṇāṃ
XXadbhutdu:2_3_3: pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet tat katamaṃ tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ
XXadbhutdu:2_4: śāstā me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ sugato me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ.
XXadbhutdu:2_5: yaṇv aham etam evārthaṃ bhagavata ārocayeyaṃ yathā me sa bhagavāṃ vyākariṣyati tathāhaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīty.
XXadbhutdu:3_0_0: [2] athāyuṣmān ānando rājagṛhe nagare sāvadānaṃ piṇḍāya caritvā kṛtabhaktakṛtya paścādbhaktapiṇḍapātapratikrāntaḥ
XXadbhutdu:3_0_1: pātracīvaraṃ pratiśamayya pādau prakṣālya yena bhagavāṃs tenopasaṃkrānta upasaṃkramya
XXadbhutdu:3_1: ekāntasthita āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat.
XXadbhutdu:3_2: ihāhaṃ bhadanta pūrvāhṇe nivāsya pātracīvaram ādāya rājagṛhaṃ piṇḍāya prāvikṣaṃ.
XXadbhutdu:3_3_0: so 'ham adrākṣam rājagṛhe nagare sāvadānaṃ piṇḍāya caramāṇo 'nyatamasmin pradeśe
XXadbhutdu:3_3_2: ca dṛṣṭvā ca punar me etad abhavat.
XXadbhutdu:3_4_0: yaḥ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā īdṛśaṃ kūṭāgāraṃ caturdiśe bhikṣusaṃghe
XXadbhutdu:3_4_1: niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhatḥ samyaksaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya mṛttikāpiṇḍād
XXadbhutdu:3_4_2: āmalakapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ
XXadbhutdu:3_4_3: cchatraṃ yavaphalapramāṇāṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet
XXadbhutdu:3_4_4: tat katamaṃ tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ syāt? tasya mamaitad abhavat.
XXadbhutdu:3_5: śāstā me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ sugato me saṃmukhībhūtaḥ.
XXadbhutdu:3_6: yanv aham etam evārthaṃ bhagavata ārocayeyaṃ yathā bhagavāṃ vyākariṣyati tathāhaṃ dhārayiṣyāmīty.
XXadbhutdu:4_1_0: idam avocat. sādhu sādhv ānanda bahujanahitāya tvam ānanda pratipanno ca bahujanasukhāya
XXadbhutdu:4_1_1: lokānukampāyai arthāya hitāya sukhāya devamanuṣyāṇāṃ yas tvaṃ tathāgatam etam evārthaṃ
XXadbhutdu:4_2: tena hy ānanda śṛṇu sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasikuru,
XXadbhutdu:4_3_0: bhāṣiṣye. jambūdvīpo hy ānanda dvīpaḥ saptayojanasahasrāṇy āyāmavistāreṇa uttaraviśālo
XXadbhutdu:4_3_1: dakṣiṇena śakaṭāmukhaḥ tam enam kāscic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ
XXadbhutdu:4_4_0: yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛtasya mṛttikāpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ
XXadbhutdu:4_4_1: stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ vā yaṣṭim āropayet badarīpatramātracchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ
XXadbhutdu:4_5: idam evānanda tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
XXadbhutdu:5_1: asty ānanda pūrvavideho nāma dvīpo 'ṣṭauyojanasahasrāṇy āyāmavistāreṇa samantād ardhacandrākārapariṇāmitaḥ.
XXadbhutdu:5_2_0: tam enaṃ kaścit śrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ kṛtvā cāturdiśe
XXadbhutdu:5_2_1: bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayet yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya
XXadbhutdu:5_2_2: mṛtpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ
XXadbhutdu:5_2_3: cchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet
XXadbhutdu:5_2_4: idam evānanda tataḥ bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
XXadbhutdu:6_1: asty ānandāvaragodānīyo nāma dvīpo navayojanasahasrāṇy āyāmavistāreṇa samantāt pūrṇacandrākārapariṇāmitaḥ.
XXadbhutdu:6_2_0: tam enaṃ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ kṛtvā yāvac
XXadbhutdu:6_2_1: cāturdiśe bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya
XXadbhutdu:6_2_2: mṛtpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ
XXadbhutdu:6_2_3: cchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet
XXadbhutdu:6_2_4: idam evānanda tataḥ prabhūtataraṃ puṇyaṃ vadāmi.
XXadbhutdu:7_1: tiṣṭhatu pūrvavideho dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatv avaragodānīyo dvīpaḥ.
XXadbhutdu:7_2: asty ānanda uttarakurur nāma dvīpaḥ daśayojanasahasrāṇy āyāmavistāreṇa samantāt samantacaturasraḥ.
XXadbhutdu:7_3_0: tam enaṃ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ kṛtvā yāvac
XXadbhutdu:7_3_1: cāturdiśe bhkiṣusaṃghe niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya
XXadbhutdu:7_3_2: mṛtpiṇḍād āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ
XXadbhutdu:7_3_3: cchattram yavaphalapramāṇaṃ pratimāṃ kārayet sarṣaphalapramāṇaṃ dhātuṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet
XXadbhutdu:8_1: tiṣṭhatu pūrvavideho dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatv avaragodānīyo dvīpaḥ.
XXadbhutdu:8_2: tiṣṭhatūttarakuru dvīpaḥ. asty ānanda śakrasya devānām indrasya vaijayanto nāma prāsādaḥ.

XXadbhutdu:9_1: tiṣṭhatu pūrvavideho dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatv avaragodānīyo dvīpaḥ.
XXadbhutdu:9_2: tiṣṭhatūttarakuru dvīpaḥ. tiṣṭhatu śakrasya devānām indrasya vaijayantaḥ prāsādaḥ.
XXadbhutdu:9_4_0: tam enaṃ kaścic chrāddhaḥ kulaputro vā kuladuhitā vā saptaratnamayaṃ kṛtvā srotāpannebhyaḥ
XXadbhutdu:9_4_1: sakṛdāgāmibhyo 'nāgāmibhyo 'rhadbhyaḥ pratyekabuddhebhyaś yāvac cāturdiśe vā bhkiṣusaṃghe
XXadbhutdu:9_4_2: niryātayed yo vā tathāgatasyārhataḥ samyakasaṃbuddhasya parinirvṛttasya mṛtpiṇḍād
XXadbhutdu:9_4_3: āmalakaphalapramāṇaṃ stūpaṃ pratiṣṭhāpayet sūcīmātrāṃ yaṣṭim āropayed badarīpatramātraṃ

XXadbhutdu:10_0_0: [9] tat kasya hetoḥ. aprameyo hy ānanda tathāgato dānenāprameyaḥ śīlenāprameyaḥ kṣāntyāprameyo
XXadbhutdu:10_0_1: vīryeṇāprameyo tyāgenāprameyo maitryāprameyaḥ karuṇayāprameyo muditayāprameya upekṣayā
XXadbhutdu:10_0_2: caturbhir vaiśāradyais daśabhis tathāgatabalaiś aṣṭādaśabhir āveṇikair buddhadharmair
XXadbhutdu:11_0: [10] evam ukto āyuṣmān ānando bhagavantam idam avocat:
XXadbhutdu:11_1: āścaryaṃ bhagavann āścaryaṃ sugata yāvad ayaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ.
XXadbhutdu:11_2: ko nāmāyaṃ dharmaparyāyaḥ. kathaṃ cainaṃ dhārayāmi. tasmāt tarhi tvam ānanda imaṃ dharmaparyāyam adbhutam adbhutadharmaparyāyaṃ iti dhāraya.
XXadbhutdu:11_3: idam avocad bhagavān āttamanās te bhikṣava āyuṣmāṃś cānando bhagavato bhāṣitam abhyanandan.
